episode: My cousin won the lottery when he was 20 years old. I'm only one year older than him. I wish it was me!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My cousin won the lottery when he was 20 years old. Must be nice, that sounds a lot better than sitting in an office cube all day long like me!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds amazing, I'm sure he's set for life now.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He is. He gets a check every year for $90,000. I wish I was the one getting those checks.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine, that's life-changing money.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yep, I am so sick of looking at spreadsheets all day long. I wonder what he's doing right now. I'd kill to switch places with him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I don't blame you, that sounds like a dream come true.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, his wife still works though. It's not like they're rich, but they probably have a lot of peace of mind.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's true, financial security can be a huge stress relief.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I wouldn't know! I've been stressing about financial security my whole life!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can relate, it's a big weight to carry.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's what I think about all of the time. I wonder what it's like to never really worry about paying bills or saving for retirement.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a huge burden lifted, I'm sure it's a great feeling.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: For him maybe, but not for me. I have high financial anxiety.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It can be really overwhelming, I'm sorry you're dealing with that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hate complaining about it because I know that most people are just like me. I would like to see what it's like to be wealthy though!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's natural to wonder what it's like on the other side.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Unfortunately, I'll probably never know. Maybe someone will decide to give me a pile of money some day like happened to him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A person can dream, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's about all I've got right now is my dreams. Unfortunately, I can't deposit dreams into my 401k.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Reality can be tough, huh?
